value.li: "How do ya like them apples?" - Applejack
"Yes I know, but honestly, that's how everypony was wearing their mane back then." - Cheerilee
"Make sense? Oh, what fun is there in making sense?" - Discord
"This won't hurt a bit... Okay, maybe it will hurt a little... *sigh* Just bite down on this." - Nurse Haywick
"Eternal chaos comes with chocolate rain, you guys! CHOCOLATE RAIN!" - Pinkie Pie
"One of these days we need to get together when the fate of Equestria isn't hanging in the balance." - Princess Cadence
"COME ON, SCHOOL OF MAGIC!" - Princess Celestia
"The fun has been doubled!" - Princess Luna
"It needs to be about 20% cooler." - Rainbow Dash
"Of all the things that could have happened, this is the WORST. POSSIBLE. THING." - Rarity
"From all of us together, together we are friends. With the marks of our destinies made one, there is magic without end!" - Twilight Sparkle
The Rainbow Laser and the Elements of Harmony both use the same image, but only the former will have any kind of quality on it.
Plushie traders can be requested from tribal, outlander and imperial factions via the comms console.
